title: Using GitOps + KubeVela for Application Continuous Delivery
description: KubeVela is based on OAM model, which naturally solves the orchestration problems of complex resources. It means that KubeVela can manage complex large-scale applications with GitOps. Convergence of team and system size after the system complexity problem.
